snippet: Two chief warrant officers were killed when their Apache attack helicopter crashed during a training mission near the Boise airport, the Idaho Army National Guard said Friday.
abstract: Stien P Gearhart and Jon L Hartway, chief warrant officers for Idaho Army National Guard, die in helicopter crash near Boise airport.
lead_paragraph: Two chief warrant officers were killed when their Apache attack helicopter crashed during a training mission near the Boise airport, the Idaho Army National Guard said Friday.

headline.main: Idaho: Soldiers Killed in Helicopter Crash
headline.print_headline: Idaho: Soldiers Killed in Helicopter Crash
